## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r, echo=TRUE}
unzip("activity.zip")
activity <- read.csv("activity.csv", header=TRUE)
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?

```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(dplyr)

activity_sum <- activity%>%
    group_by(date) %>%
    summarise(daily=sum(steps, na.rm=TRUE))

print(hist(activity_sum$daily, main="Histogram of total number of steps daily taken", xlab=""))

print(mean(activity_sum$daily))
print(median(activity_sum$daily))

```
